testcase.name: Add new Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User lauch chrome browser.............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com"....................passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on login..........................................................passed Then User can view the Dashboard............................................passed When User click on customer Menu............................................passed And Click on Customer Menu Item.............................................passed And Click on Add New button.................................................passed Then User can view Add new customer page....................................passed When User enter customer info...............................................passed And Click on save button....................................................passed Then User can view cofirmation message "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
